    • Method Detail

      • act

        public abstract Types.ACTIONS act(StateObservation stateObs,
                ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Picks an action. This function is called every game step to request an action from the player. The action returned must be contained in the actions accessible from stateObs.getAvailableActions(), or no action will be applied.
        Parameters:
        stateObs - Observation of the current state.
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        An action for the current state

      • setup

        public final void setup(java.lang.String actionFile,
         int randomSeed)
        This function sets up the controller to save the actions executed in a given game.
        Parameters:
        actionFile - file to save the actions to.
        randomSeed - Seed for the sampleRandom generator of the game to be played.

      • teardown

        public final void teardown()
        Closes the agent, writing actions to file.

      • logAction

        public final void logAction(Types.ACTIONS action)
        Logs a single action
        Parameters:
        action - the action to log.

      • getLastAction

        public Types.ACTIONS getLastAction()
        Gets the last action executed by this controller.
        Returns:
        the last action

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Gets the player the control to draw something on the screen. It can be used for debug purposes.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics device to draw to.
